domains.description: Ensures data is collected, standardized, integrated, and made accessible across the enterprise.

attributes.description: Provides golden records for customers, products, suppliers, and other entities.
attributes.reasoning: Ensures consistency and reduces duplication across enterprise systems.

attributes.description: Tracks business, technical, and operational metadata including lineage.
Supports ETL/ELT pipelines, API ingestion, and streaming from multiple sources.
attributes.reasoning: Foundation for enabling analytics and machine learning.

attributes.description: Ensures data is cleansed, validated, and fit for purpose.
attributes.reasoning: Improves trust and reliability of insights.

domains.description: Builds and manages pipelines to move, transform, and enrich data for analytics and ML.

attributes.description: Enables both scheduled and real-time data processing.
attributes.reasoning: Supports a range of use cases from reporting to operational decisioning.

attributes.description: Applies business logic, aggregation, and enrichment to raw data.
attributes.reasoning: Transforms raw data into actionable insights.

attributes.description: Manages scheduling, dependencies, and automation of data workflows.
attributes.reasoning: Ensures reliability and efficiency of pipeline execution.

attributes.description: Implements CI/CD practices, monitoring, and testing for data pipelines.
attributes.reasoning: Improves reliability and reduces pipeline failure risks.

missing_domains.description: Capabilities focused on prompt engineering, LLM fine-tuning, and RAG pipelines.
missing_domains.reasoning: Growing demand for generative AI integration with analytics and ML.

missing_attributes.description: Ensures fairness, bias monitoring, and regulatory compliance for ML/AI models.

recommendations.next_steps: Expand to include generative AI, strengthen governance for AI models, and enhance monitoring capabilities.
